name: MinimPy

screenshots.caption: An screenshot of MinimPy showing the Settings tab

short_description:
MinimPy is a desktop application program for sequential allocation of subjects to treatment groups in clinical trials by using the method of minimisation. Comprehensive reference help is available at: http://minimpy.sourceforge.net
For those who have difficulty installing MinimPy, an online version is available at:
http://qminim.sourceforge.net
Also there is a Minimizer android app available at: http://slideme.org/application/minimizer
MinimPy has been full described in the foolowing article:
Saghaei, M. and Saghaei, S. (2011) Implementation of an open-source customizable minimization program for allocation of patients to parallel groups in clinical trials. Journal of Biomedical Science and Engineering, 4, 734-739. doi: 10.4236/jbise.2011.411090. Available at: http://www.scirp.org/journal/PaperInformation.aspx?PaperID=8518
